'''Passage's Parasol''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Passage's Parasol is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Fontaine]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in [[West Slopes of Mont Automnequi]] after riding [[The Miraculous Antoine Roger Aircraft]].
